title: Corpus-Based Lexical Analysis of Indonesian Emotional Expressions: 'Sakit' vs. 'Nyeri' (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Indonesian grammar and conversational proficiency for daily communication
context.additional_context: A short-term language proficiency enhancement program for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the usage differences between 'sakit' and 'nyeri' with over 80% accuracy using corpus data
Learners can apply a classification system for Indonesian emotional expressions based on body parts and intensity in practical settings
Learners can analyze the appropriate usage of the two vocabulary items in 10+ real-world text examples
Learners can synthesize learning content to complete an Indonesian conversation project (3-minute dialogue composition)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
